nodes.text: Dhal was a Human male who worked as an agent to the Republic Strategic Information Service during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3642 BBY, Dhal posed as Peyton Swole, Director of Galactic Relations for the Adasca BioMechanical Corporation of Arkania, to lure out the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt responsible for murdering the Jedi Master Kellian Jarro and the destruction of the Aurora. Luring the hunter to Quesh, Dhal sprung a strike team to arrest the bounty hunter. The bounty hunter refused to cooperate and engaged the strike team. Agent Dhal and his team tried to restrain the hunter, but were all killed.
